title: Mary Katrantzou goes back to her roots with a catwalk spectacular at the Temple of Poseidon in Athens
text:
Up to four thousand tourists a day throng the Temple of Poseidon. They arrive by the busload from Athens to explore the ancient site and pose for selfies high above the Aegean sea. It’s only after they depart that the goddesses descend to make their nocturnal processions around the temple’s Doric columns - at least that’s how it looked on Thursday evening, when Mary Katrantzou staged her spring-summer 2020 fashion show amid the ruins.

Just after nightfall, they came - some 38 models stepping nymph-like through clouds of mist. One of the first models flowed more than walked down the purpose-built runway in liquid tiers of silver silk fringing. Another glided past in celadon organza that shivered...
description: Up to four thousand tourists a day throng the Temple of Poseidon.
